abstract: Failure of South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye's administration to contain outbreak of Middle East respiratory syndrome has shaken country's confidence in her capability; critics and political analysts say failure has called into question her ability to address number of issues facing the country.
lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye’s image as a strong leader who can keep a clear head in a crisis has come crashing down as her government struggles to contain an outbreak of Middle East respiratory syndrome.

headline.main: MERS Tarnishes Korean President’s Image as Leader
headline.print_headline: MERS Tarnishes Korean President’s Image as Leader

snippet: President Park Geun-hye’s image as a strong leader who can keep a clear head in a crisis has come crashing down as her government struggles to contain an outbreak of Middle East respiratory syndrome.
